Articles.Content:
Hello there! Here is a small graphical mod that adds a ring to Jool.

I made this to showcase a new tool I wrote that can add rings to planets, and as such, the plugin the tool uses is required.

A link will be provided...

Screenshot:

Download:

V1:

https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/80556647/Rings_Of_jool.rar

KittopiaTech In-Game Planet Tools (Required, or all you get is a useless cfg and texture):

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/68619-Plugin-WIP-KittopiaTech-Ingame-Terraforming-Tools-V0-1

Changelog:

V1:

-Released

Licence:

Under KittopiaTech tools license, mainly:

I would rather not have someone monetize it in any form (This includes sites such as the dreaded ad.fly, or any other such thing.) this includes all files generated by said plugin.

Note: I do not know what this mod falls under... I guess plugin since it is a cfg for a plugin

Edited June 5, 2014 by KCreator
Additional information

Oh cool! That looks awesome! I'm going to have to check this out!

Edit: Could you post a picture of The day side of Jool with the ring lit up by the sun?

Edited June 2, 2014 by Rabada

I like it! Is there a way to get the back shadowed so it's not always lit up?

---Updated---

I am seeing a strange white outline around Jool? Also the rings are bright in the Tracking Station but dark in flight?

Edited June 3, 2014 by tygoo7

Could you post a picture of The day side of Jool with the ring lit up by the sun?

Certainly. I admit that screenshot is pretty awful.

I like it! Is there a way to get the back shadowed so it's not always lit up?

Unfortunately not, At least with my knowledge. Kerbol is actually a universal light, and shading to emulate shadowing and depth would require a shader, and I am not a particular good at shaders...

I am seeing a strange white outline around Jool? Also the rings are bright in the Tracking Station but dark in flight?

I will check into this, hopefully a fix will be soon.

I like it! Is there a way to get the back shadowed so it's not always lit up?

---Updated---

I am seeing a strange white outline around Jool? Also the rings are bright in the Tracking Station but dark in flight?

That's because the atmosphere is turning blue. The Tacking station also for some reason hates light. As seen here:

Javascript is disabled. View full album
is it the same thing that is used in planet factory?

Similar code, due to the fact it is a procedural ring mesh. I will be working to improve it, perhaps attempt to write a shader

On a side note, I deleted a few lines in it, it should prevent the atmosphere colours from breaking, I will be attempting to fix various bugs related to rings in general.

Now that, is awesome. Hey, KCreator, a small question regarding KittopiaTech: would it be possible to modify Krag's Sentar system with it (just for personal use, of course) to be closer to Kerbol and less inclined? Or would that cause all kinds of weirdness between the two mods?

Kittopiatech should be able to modify Krags planets just fine, at least last I checked.

Also, now that alpha transparency works correctly with rings, I should be able to create something a bit more visually appealing.

Kittopiatech should be able to modify Krags planets just fine, at least last I checked.

Also, now that alpha transparency works correctly with rings, I should be able to create something a bit more visually appealing.

Sounds awesome, both of them. I didn't really want to install the Sentar pack because it was too far out for me to visit, at least before unlocking the warp drive in KSPI. I just don't like to put my Kerbals on excessively long trips.

Kittopiatech should be able to modify Krags planets just fine, at least last I checked.

Also, now that alpha transparency works correctly with rings, I should be able to create something a bit more visually appealing.

Could you please add version numbers to your download file, so we can tell when you have made changes. Thanks!
